sourcesContent: import React from 'react' function IssueItem({ issue, index }) { const newDate = new Date(issue.createdAt).toDateString() const handleClick = (e) => { switch (e.target.name) { case "view": history.push(`/projects/${issue._id}`) break case "edit": setEdit(true) setProjectId(project._id) break case "remove": setProjectId(project._id) } } return ( {index} { issue.title } { issue.project } { issue.user.username } { issue.priority } { issue.status } { issue.type } { newDate } { <> } ) } export default IssueItem
